name: Notifications with Auto Layout
description:
Notification components that use Auto Layout for their content.

  • Placeholder icons are Material Design icons.
  • Placeholder font used is Inter
  • Resize the component to get your desired width, or let Auto Layout do the work by changing the text content


I hope you find them helpful if you want a template to start with, and also learn a few tricks using Auto Layout! ðŸ™‚
